Basic Web Functions
info:
Here are the basic web functions for reCamera.
Please notice that if you change this part, the basic functions for the reCamera could be damaged or missing.

Preview Demo
info:
This is the demo for reCamera Gimbal.

We created a dashboard for gimbal for users 
to get a idea of how you can use nodes to 
control the gimbal. Feel free to modify
the flow at your wish.

Just be mindful that the device does have
some CPU limitation.

Printing out multiple debugs or using multiple
CAN nodes will result in a high CPU and cause
the crash of the device.

name: get_target_box
save_track_target
func:
global.set("trackTarget", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: joystick

do not need them to show in the dashboard.

name: Generate PID Config
Send PID Config
Yaw Angle Recommend PID
label: Angle PID Recommended: Kp = 50; Ki = 0; Kd = 0; If leave empty, it will use the current motor pid parameter.

name: Yaw Speed Recommend PID
label: Speed PID Recommended: Kp = 260; Ki = 20; Kd = 0; If leave empty, it will use the current motor pid parameter.

name: Pitch Angle Recommend PID
label: Angle PID Recommended: Kp = 50; Ki = 0; Kd = 0; If leave empty, it will use the current motor pid parameter.

name: Pitch Speed Recommend PID
label: Speed PID Recommended: Kp = 100; Ki = 20; Kd = 0; If leave empty, it will use the current motor pid parameter.
